mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (id, username, name, gender, email, password, salt, create_time, update_time, last_login_time) values (uuid_to_bin(#{id}), #{username}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{password}, uuid_to_bin(#{salt}), #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{lastLoginTime})
mapper.select: select bin_to_uuid(id) as id, username, name, email, password, replace(bin_to_uuid(salt), '-', '') as salt, gender, permission, fail_count, create_time, update_time, last_login_time from tb_user where username = #{username}

select bin_to_uuid(id) as id, username, name, gender, email, password, replace(bin_to_uuid(salt), '-', '') as salt, permission, fail_count, create_time, update_time, last_login_time from tb_user where email = #{email}

select bin_to_uuid(id) as 'id', username, name, gender, email, password, bin_to_uuid(salt) as 'salt', permission, fail_count, create_time, update_time, last_login_time from tb_user where id = uuid_to_bin(#{uid})
